This is the first post, and I was thinking I would note down some stuff I did in python today. Trying python3 print function for fun and profit.

To use it in python2: 

#!/usr/bin/env python2
from __future__ import print_function
print("Starting: ", end='')
for i in range(10):
        print(i, end='')
            print("Done!")

And it is native in python3 

#!/usr/bin/env python3
print("Starting: ", end='')
for i in range(10):
        print(i, end='')
            print("Done!")

This will print:

Starting: 0123456789Done!

And that is super exciting!
